bug.title: App crashes when changing orientation while viewing reports
bug.description:
#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour 1. Open one of the reports (pie chart, line chart, bar chart or sheet). 2. Turn the phone to change the screen orientation.
#### Expected behaviour Report shows in the new screen orientation.
#### Actual behaviour App crashes.
#### Software specifications * GnuCash Android version: 2.1.3 * System Android version: Android 6.0.1, CyanogenMod 13.0 * Device type: Nexus 4
